author: nicolaken
msg: I have removed the resources/images of the fresh-site, so
I need to fix this link to point to the new location.
Note that this does not show a compatibility issue, as if I would
place the images under resources/images, it would still work.

author: nicolaken
msg: Also the scripts now fallback to the common version :-)

author: nicolaken
msg: Images in skins/common/images are used if the corresponding image
is not found in the skin being used.
Moved under this dir the images
that were placed by default under resources/images, and added a
temporary sitemap rule to route the request of these to the new location.
Moved also the common images in this dir to reduce unneeded duplication.
